State/Ministry: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY)
Key Features: Funding for R\&D, innovation, and indigenous technology development in cybersecurity (including AI security, encryption, forensics, critical infrastructure, women/children safety online, etc.)
Cyber Space Focus: Yes – Directly for cyber security research, productization, and innovation
Eligibility/Application: Researchers, academic institutions, R\&D orgs, consortia; apply via MeitY portal; proposals evaluated by expert group [1]

Key Features: Up to ₹20 lakh for proof of concept, up to ₹50 lakh for market entry; sector-agnostic but includes cybersecurity
Eligibility/Application: DPIIT-recognized startups; apply via Startup India portal [2]

Key Features: 4-month accelerator, ₹15–25 lakh seed funding, mentorship, Demo Day for further funding; focused on cybersecurity startups
Eligibility/Application: Early-stage/seed cybersecurity startups; apply via Startup India portal [3]

Scheme/Grant Name: Gujarat Startup Policy (Interest Subsidy & Sustenance Allowance)
Key Features: 8% interest subsidy (max ₹4 lakh/year, 3 years) on loans; ₹10,000/month sustenance allowance for 1 year; sector-agnostic, includes IT/cyber
Eligibility/Application: Registered startups in incubators; apply to state nodal agency [4]

Key Features: Grants for student-led innovation/startups, including tech/cybersecurity; proposal-based
Eligibility/Application: Students/teams with approved proposals; apply via SSIP portal [5]

Key Features: Seed funding, grants, and special schemes (e.g., for women-led startups); sector-agnostic, includes IT/cyber
Eligibility/Application: Registered startups; apply via MSInS portal [6]

Key Features: Seed funding, incubation support, and grants for tech startups; sector-agnostic, includes IT/cyber
Eligibility/Application: Registered startups; apply via UP Startup portal [7]

Key Features: Seed funding, incubation, and grants for tech/IT startups; sector-agnostic, includes cyber
Eligibility/Application: Registered startups; apply via Uttarakhand Startup portal [7]
